translations: n.[法] 合法化；法律认可

phrs.translation: 法制化, 赌场合法化, 使合法化批准
领事认证, 使馆认证, 要多久可以通过认证呢使领馆加签, 使领馆加签
维护法制化, 合法化维修, 赌波合法化维修
法律文书的公证手续, 翻译

sentences.sentence: She has made outspoken remarks about the legalization of marijuana.
sentences.translation: 她直言不讳地评论过大麻合法化问题。

sentences.sentence: I felt that it was irresponsible to advocate the legalization of drugs.
sentences.translation: 我觉得主张毒品合法化是不负责任的。

sentences.sentence: Legalization of drugs would drive the drug-dealing business off the streets.
sentences.translation: 毒品合法化会将毒品买卖从大街上清除。
